description.english: Read your first book or scroll
Use the Resurrection Shrine for the first time
Complete the Black Mages Quarters chapter
Finish the game on Easy difficulty
Finish the game on Normal or Hard difficulty
Unlock All secrets in the game
Play for 1 Hour in a single playthrough
Play for 3 Hours  in a single playthrough
Play for 6 Hours  in a single playthrough
Play for 12 Hours  in a single  playthrough
Play for 18 Hours in a single  playthrough
Make 10 Damages in a single Melee Attack
Make 15 Damages in a single Melee Attack
Make 20 Damages in a single Melee Attack
Finish the game with only 1 character
Reach Level 6 in Wizard, Fighter, Priest or Ninja
Reach Level 8 in Wizard, Fighter, Priest or Ninja
Reach Level 10 in Wizard, Fighter, Priest or Ninja
Kill a monster using a Spear
Kill a monster with a Bow
Kill a monster with Lighting Bolt
